task.title: Configuring user authentication and password policies

taskbody.context: Web SSO will be enabled only after the “commit” step of the upgrade. To avoid any provisioning traffic interruption during the SM upgrade, you must perform the following:

step.cmd: Open Web SSO UI using the link:
Log in to the page using credentials. Contact Nokia for the credentials. (You can change the admin password later.)
Select Users→View all users from the Web SSO UI.
Click on the Edit button of one user.
Change the password as follows. The password must be the same as the password used to login into the SM UI earlier.

substep.cmd: Click on “Delete” button for the existing password.
Confirm the deletion by clicking on “Delete Credentials” in the alert box.
A “Set Password” screen is displayed after you confirm the deletion.

info.p: Enter the password and password confirmation in the “Set Password” screen.

step.cmd: Set Temporary OFF and click “Set Password”.
Navigate to the details and perform the following:

substep.cmd: Remove all actions in “Required User Actions” Text Box.
Set the “Email Verified” dialogue to “ON”. (The email is verified).

step.cmd: Repeat steps 1 to 8 of this procedure for each user.
Return to perform step 11-l of the procedure ( Enabling DFSEC) after you have completed this procedure for each user.
